hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Dodongos Cavern Boss Room Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)
locations.Forest Temple Raised Island Courtyard Ch: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Green Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Blue Potion Bottle#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##the Market## has #5# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Bottom of the Well Small Key Ring#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple Raised Island Courtyard Chest
hinted_items: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Boomerang#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #5# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #riding the bean in Lake Hylia# leads to...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #4# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #the Eyeball Frog# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #the Minuet of Forest#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that Phantom Ganon is a big Louisa May Alcott fan.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Spirit Temple Small Key Ring#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that Twinrova always casts the same spell the first three times.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #Epona's Song#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #the Song of Storms#.
